Boundary Level: Highest common occurrence (HCO) of Chiloguembelina cubensis
Correlation Events: Oxygen isotope excursion possibly related to the Oi2a glaciation event

Boundary Level: base of a 0.5m thick greenishgrey marl bed 19m above base of section

GSSP Location: Alano section, Piave River; Veneto Prealps, Belluno province, N. Italy
Boundary Level: The base of a prominent crystal tuff layer, the Tiziano bed, at meter 63.57
Correlation Events: Extinction of large acarininids and Morozovelloides crassatus; the Base of common and continuous Cribrocentrum erbae and the Top of Chiasmolithus grandis; the Base of Chron C17n and Subchron C17n.2n

GSSP Location: Contessa highway section near Gubio, Central Apennines, Italy
Correlation Events: Calcareous nannofossil near LAD Reticulofenestra reticulata

Boundary Level: dark marl at 167.85 m in Gorrondatxe sea-cliff section
Correlation Events: LO of calcareous nannofossil Blackites inflatus (CP12a/b boundary); middle of polarity Chron C21r

Boundary Level: Base of Bed 1 in DBH subsection
Correlation Events: Carbon Isotope Excursion base, initiation of basal Eocene Thermal maximum ("PETM")

Boundary Level: 30.5m above the base of Itzurun Formation
base of the red marls of Itzurun Formation
Correlation Events: 2nd radiation of the calcareous nannofossil group Fasciculithus and sea-level fall

GSSP Location: Oued Djerfane, west of El Kef, Tunisia
Boundary Level: reddish layer at the base of the 50cm thick, dark boundary clay
Correlation Events: Iridium geochemical anomaly. Associated with a major extinction horizon (dinosaurs, ammonites, foraminifers, etc.)
